project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of: (i) the construction and equipping of 22 new primary schools, 22 rural education centers, one teacher training college including a demonstration school, and additional laboratories, workshops, dormitories and staff quarters for seven existing secondary schools; (ii) expansion and strengthening of the Project Implementation Unit; and (iii) pre-investment studies.
